Package Installation Guide

Installing Packages

Follow these steps to install the required packages for the project.

Package 1

Install Package 1 using pip:

pip install package1

Package 2

Install Package 2 using npm:

npm install package2

Package 3

Install Package 3 manually:


# Clone the repo
git clone https://github.com/user/package3.git

# Navigate into the folder
cd package3

# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt
